definition: topic/problem for discussion/exam question/subject/to inscribe/to mention/CL:個|个[ge4],道[dao4]

sentences.english: The Research Team of Campsite Guidance, Haizhu District, Guangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 广州市海珠区营地辅导研究课题组。

sentences.english: This paper based on the boiler rebuild project of DaLian Maritime University.
sentences.chinese: 本课题来源于大连海事大学的锅炉房改建工程。

sentences.english: This dissertation is an important part of the Tenth Five-year National defense preparatory Plan.
sentences.chinese: 本文是“十五”国防预研课题的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The history of Han literature on Ryukyu Islands is a topic that no body has studied yet.
sentences.chinese: 琉球汉文学史是一个尚无人研究的课题。

sentences.english: The three-dimensional object recognition is an important topic in computer vision research.
sentences.chinese: 三维物体识别是计算机视觉研究的一项重要课题。

sentences.english: How to develop the economy of tax fund is a new problem now.
sentences.chinese: 如何培育地方税源经济是当前的新课题。

sentences.english: The disposal of municipal solid waste is an important project of environmental protection.
sentences.chinese: 城市生活垃圾的处置是环境保护的一个重大课题。

sentences.english: Gold recovery from arsenic-containing gold ore has been a major subject of flotation research.
sentences.chinese: 从含砷金矿石中回收金一直是浮选研究的重要课题。

sentences.english: Therefore, how to build political civilization is a new question for study.
sentences.chinese: 因此，如何建设政治文明是一个新的课题。

sentences.english: It is indicated that it is an interested problem on the use of polyester bottle in packing beer.
sentences.chinese: 指出研制灌装啤酒用聚酯瓶是近年的一个热门课题。

sentences.english: Beral thinks a more interesting candidate for study is prolactin .
sentences.chinese: 贝拉尔认为，一个更为有趣的研究课题是泌乳刺激素。

sentences.english: The research of automatic cartographic generalization is a very difficult subject.
sentences.chinese: 数字地图自动综合的研究是一个非常艰难的课题。

sentences.english: Land of afforest of large area afforestation is the one big task that crosses century China.
sentences.chinese: 大面积植树造林绿化国土是跨世纪中国的一大课题。

sentences.english: This paper will discuss a recycling-oriented society in the areas of dematerialization and detoxification.
sentences.chinese: 本论文以去物质化与去毒化探讨建立循环型社会课题。

sentences.english: The potential curricula is a new task and hotspot of the current teaching research?
sentences.chinese: 潜在课程是当今教学研究的一个新课题和热点。

sentences.english: This is the victory of the October Revolution in Russia after the encounter is a new topic.
sentences.chinese: 这是俄国十月革命胜利后遇到的一个新课题。

definition: proposition (logic, math.)/to assign an essay topic
research/a study/CL:項|项[xiang4]/to research/to look into
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
to prove a point/to expound on/to demonstrate or prove (through argument)/proof
